name: Firewall (studiokaboom)
description:
The computer is under threat of being infected by malware and the computer’s firewall is its last line of defense. It will be up to the player to decide whether a file is malware or not, but be careful. If too much malware get through, the computer will crash however if too much legitimate files are blocked, the computer will not be able to run.

Press "E" to interact NPCs.

WASD and arrow key to move your character.

Use the mouse to choose dialog options.
